text: This has a Salad Bar and a Beverage Fountain. This is important to write in review because they have no mention of it any where on the menu screens at the restaurant. The menu brochures. The website has no mention of a salad bar either! It â€¦More

text: simple simons is by far the best pizza place around. the staff is what impresses me the most, theyâ€™re  always positive and they give it their all to make sure your pizza is out fast and enjoyable. if youâ€™re looking for pizza that will knock your socks off this is it! i wouldnâ€™t recommend anywhere else!!

text: My boyfriend and I visited this place last month and purchased ONE salad and a 10 pc order of wings. We waited for 45 minutes to get our (7) wings. They didnâ€™t even give us the 10 we paid for. Our total was near $35. Yesterday we returned â€¦More

text: Simple Simonâ€™s Pizza was delicious. We went to lake Texoma for camping. When we went to the shop they welcomed us. We bought simple Simonâ€™s pizza for our lunch. The price of pizza was reasonable. The taste of pizza was excellent. The cashier provided us tomato ketchup and napkins without asking. The customer service was excellent.
